xml.name: Extract Variable
xml.Try: Press IntroduceVariable to extract the constant 50 to the variable or field y.
xml.Text: Extract Variable does not require you to select the exact code you want to extract. You can simply place the caret on the statement you want to extract and then select the needed expression.
xml.Try: Now, press IntroduceVariable and extract CGRect to the variable frame, by selecting it from the list.
